headline: Progressive Announces Dividend Information And 2026 Annual Meeting Record Date
summary: MAYFIELD VILLAGE, OHIO, Dec. 08, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- On December 5, 2025, the Board of Directors of The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) declared an annual common share dividend, in the amount of $13.50 per share, and a quarterly common share dividend, in the amount of $0.10 per share. Both the annual and quarterly dividends are payable January 8, 2026, to shareholders of record at the close of business on January 2, 2026. headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock Worth Your Attention and 2 We Turn Down
summary: While the S&P 500 (^GSPC) includes industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a winner. Some companies are past their prime, weighed down by poor execution, weak financials, or structural headwinds.
